Module PSP24
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.Utilities

Class UI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.Utilities.UI
Direct Known Subclasses:
GUI, TUI
public abstract class UI extends Object
User Interface This class is used also for TUI and GUI
